00038 ClientConnectionHandler::ClientConnectionHandler(Comm *comm, Session *session, time_t timeout) : m_comm(comm), m_session(session), m_session_id(0), m_state(DISCONNECTED), m_verbose(false), m_timeout(timeout) {
00039   memset(&m_master_addr, 0, sizeof(struct sockaddr_in));
00040   return;
00041 }

00047 ClientConnectionHandler::~ClientConnectionHandler() {
00048   if (m_master_addr.sin_port != 0)
00049     m_comm->close_socket(m_master_addr);
00050 }

00053 void ClientConnectionHandler::handle(Hypertable::EventPtr &eventPtr) {
00054   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00055   int error;
00056 
00057   if (m_verbose) {
00058     HT_INFOF("%s", eventPtr->toString().c_str());
00059   }
00060 
00061   if (eventPtr->type == Hypertable::Event::MESSAGE) {
00062 
00063     if (Protocol::response_code(eventPtr.get()) != Error::OK) {
00064       HT_ERRORF("Connection handshake error: %s", Protocol::string_format_message(eventPtr.get()).c_str());
00065       m_comm->close_socket(eventPtr->addr);
00066       m_state = DISCONNECTED;
00067       return;
00068     }
00069 
00070     m_session->state_transition(Session::STATE_SAFE);
00071 
00072     m_state = CONNECTED;
00073   }
00074   else if (eventPtr->type == Hypertable::Event::DISCONNECT) {
00075 
00076     if (m_verbose) {
00077       HT_WARNF("%s", eventPtr->toString().c_str());
00078     }
00079 
00080     m_session->state_transition(Session::STATE_JEOPARDY);
00081 
00082     m_state = DISCONNECTED;
00083   }
00084   else if (eventPtr->type == Hypertable::Event::CONNECTION_ESTABLISHED) {
00085 
00086     m_state = HANDSHAKING;
00087 
00088     memcpy(&m_master_addr, &eventPtr->addr, sizeof(struct sockaddr_in));
00089 
00090     CommBufPtr commBufPtr( Hyperspace::Protocol::create_handshake_request(m_session_id) );
00091 
00092     if ((error = m_comm->send_request(eventPtr->addr, m_timeout, commBufPtr, this)) != Error::OK) {
00093       HT_ERRORF("Problem sending handshake request - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00094       m_comm->close_socket(eventPtr->addr);
00095       m_state = DISCONNECTED;
00096     }
00097   }
00098   else {
00099     HT_INFOF("%s", eventPtr->toString().c_str());
00100     m_comm->close_socket(eventPtr->addr);
00101     m_state = DISCONNECTED;
00102   }
00103 
00104 }
